tag_list: damian-ryan, mediaventura, ma, digital, capital-raise, advisory, buside, sellside, online-advertising, understanding-digital-marketing
overview:
Deal making is in his blood. Damian continues to innovate and provide value in a business he truly loves with a passion. He built and sold three of his own media businesses before embarking on this path and was fortunate to be a partner of Results International Group for several years before setting up Mediaventura. He has worked on transactions with the following organisations; Publicis Groupe Worldwide, Nokia, Communicorp Group, Alphyra plc, Warner Bros, Groove Media Inc, Jolt Online, Yahoo, Microsoft, and many others.

This means Damian understands the challenges involved from all sides - the entrepreneur, the investor and the individuals that comprise the deal. He has truly been there and done that!
